|chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43235;BCM43235KMLG, HT1024 P20, E9CXC.15 6 W; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |802.11n = 300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 05/23/2011 |estreldate = 06/08/2011 |price = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 745883593255 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- Newegg number --> |asin = B0054YQOM0 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |country = China
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== Appears to be manufactured by Wistron NeWeb. DNUB-C1 is the model mentioned on the sample label provided to the FCC.
Mostly (?) unsupported by brcmfmac. Although the AE1200 has a BCM43235 chipset, brcmfmac only supports revision 3 and up and many AE1200s use an earlier revision that is not supported. [http://www.spinics.net/lists/linux-wireless/msg94934.html] However, some newer dongles may be supported (maybe they're using BCM43235B). [https://patchwork.kernel.org/patch/9189125/]
==Pictures== <center>'''FCCID {{fccid|Q87-AE1200}}''' <gallery> File:FCCID Q87-AE1200 001.png| File:FCCID Q87-AE1200 002.png| File:FCCID Q87-AE1200 003.png| File:FCCID Q87-AE1200 004.png| File:FCCID Q87-AE1200 005.png| File:FCCID Q87-AE1200 006.png| File:FCCID Q87-AE1200 007.png| </gallery></center>[[Has images::fcc| ]][[Has images::internal| ]]
